description: A coarse linen shift in gray-cream with short sleeves

core:description.text: A simple shift of coarse, unbleached linen in a dull gray-cream color. The short sleeves end just above the elbow, and the rough-woven fabric scratches faintly against the skin. This is the undergarment of common folkâ€”practical, unadorned, and showing the honest wear of countless washings. The seams are sturdy but uneven, the work of village hands rather than a professional tailor.
